name: backlog
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large number of things that you should have done before and must do now: I've got a huge backlog of work to do.

Add to word list
Add to word list
a large number of things waiting to be done: I have a huge backlog of work on my desk.
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large number of things you have to do or deal with that has increased over a period of time: She has a three-week backlog of work. a backlog of orders a growing/huge backlogcatch up on/deal with/clear a backlog I need to catch up on my backlog of emails before I can start work.
